EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015.Email - Final Confirmation for Registrants
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation: Tricentis Accelerate 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for registering for Accelerate 2015. We are looking forward to seeing you in Vienna on October 22nd!
Are you a Twitter fan? Be sure to tweet during Accelerate using the hashtag #TriAcc for the chance to win a pair of Marshall premium headphones.
We have limited space left in our Workshops – make sure to sign up for a workshop here <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/#workshop> before the seats are gone!
Please note that we have made some updates to our Accelerate agenda, which can be viewed here <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/#program>.
Location: Novomatic Forum <http://www.novomaticforum.com> Friedrichstraße 7 1010 Wien, Austria
See you soon in Vienna!
Best Regards,
Your Tricentis Events Team
